itunes:summary:
“Great art sells itself.” This is a common trope in the creative world. It’s the idea that merit and quality are the reason some things take off and others don’t. 

In this episode we dismantle this myth and take a deeper look into why people buy into new things and how this can inform how we market and promote our creative work.

In this episode you will:
Discover the real reason people try new things
How to signal to potential new fans that they will like your work
Identify and Destroy Self Made Obstacles You Have Created that Repel New Followers

This is part 4 and the final part of our Creative Elixir Series - You find all the episodes here:
https://www.creativepeptalk.com/episodes/tag/elixir
